saturday: Mostly cloudy. Rain likely, except chance of showers in the St. Lawrence Valley, and rain possibly tapering to showers mid to afternoon west of the Greens. Highs from the mid 50s to around 60, some lower 50s northeast, and some lower 60s in the Hudson and St. Lawrence valleys. Winds becoming northwest 5 to 10 mph.
saturday_night: Mainly clear in the south; clear to partly cloudy north. Chance of evening showers east of the Greens; slight chance overnight in the northeast. Lows from the upper 30s to mid 40s.
sunday: Partly to mostly sunny. Highs from the mid 50s to lower 60s north, and low to mid 60s in the south, except southeastern valleys in the mid to upper 60s.
sunday_night: Mostly clear and cool. Lows in the upper 30s to mid 40s.
